entry.title: Realtime diffs
entry.content:
New feature has just been rolled out to production - realtime diffs!

Whenever you’re updating a snippet, you should now see your changes immediately as you type. How cool is that?

entry.title: Diffboard UI revamped
entry.content:
Diffboard just got a new UI. Major features include:

  • Fully responsive layout

The layout is fluid and scales according to screen resolution. This means that users accessing the site from mobile devices will have much better experience.

  • Better version navigation

Since each snippet can have multiple versions, switching between them should be as easy as possible. On the other hand, most users are interested only in the latest version - so the navigation shouldn’t clutter the interface. Versions are now browsed using a top bar:

  • Side by side data and diffs

It’s important to see both the data and the changes. This is archieved using a side by side view.

I hope these changes will make the overall Diffboard user experience better.
